useCase.name: Provide Server SLA to Data Contributors
useCase.trigger: User accesses SLA management section in EDRMS Portal

mainSequence.step: Repoadmin accesses SLA management section in EDRMS Portal
EDRMS Portal retrieves SLA details from SLA Database
EDRMS Portal displays SLA details to Repoadmin
Repoadmin selects SLA details to share
Repoadmin provides SLA details to Data Contributor
Data Contributor acknowledges receipt to Repoadmin
